name: PowerStep Pulse Maxx Running Insoles
description: Maximum cushioning and support insoles designed specifically for running, offering relief from plantar fasciitis and other foot pain while providing stability and shock absorption.
longDescription: PowerStep Pulse Maxx Running Insoles combine maximum cushioning with targeted support to enhance your running experience while alleviating foot pain. These specialized insoles feature a deep heel cradle for stability, a firm yet flexible arch support for improved motion control, and a cushioned forefoot that minimizes impact. Designed for high-impact activities, they provide biomechanical support to prevent overpronation and reduce joint stress. The antimicrobial top fabric helps reduce friction and heat buildup, protecting against blisters during extended use. Trusted by both athletes and podiatrists, these insoles offer a durable and effective solution for foot discomfort.
